pullRequest.title: 111 increase databus coverage
pullRequest.bodyText:
Purpose of this PR is related to increase the code coverage percentage of the domain module, applying a refactoring engineering for a better understanding.
Related issue #111

commit.message: Increase model coverage for core domain
Increase coverage for core domain module
removed test class with methods merged into CopybookEventsTest
rename methods for a better understanding
re-arranged the structure of core domain module to better understanding and satisfy guice best practices requirements.
Move Position class into a brand new package common.model to clearly identify an object shared between multiple modules.

nodes.bodyText: Please, make this name all capitals due to the naming convention
I think we don't really need this method due to we do not startup a DI context. If you delete it, please, do it also for the other tests in this suite.
Please, make these names all capitals due to the naming convention. Also, do we need getters for them?
The default parameter value may be skipped here

nodes.bodyText:
I don't think that CopybookObserver is a good name because the purpose of this mechanism is to allow communications between different modules and not only for the copybooks.
For example, I am going to use it to allow calls from the WorkspaceService to the TextDocumentService after triggering by the watcher.

commit.message: Apply changes required by code review stage

nodes.bodyText: please extract this getREQCPY in a global variable in order to avoid multiple duplicate codes, same for every other getter in the class
if the field is static there is no need for "@getter", make the field public

commit.message: Apply changes required by code review stage + merge conflicts for Position's package move
